name: Police Transporter Simulator
description:
Now it's all up to you how quiet the city will be...

Police Transporter Simulator is a sim game in which you have to transport police vehicles (cars, tanks, trucks). It's a well-paid job, so you have to take care of the goods you carry. But beware, no one needs to know what you're doing and where you're going!

Game Features :
- 10 levels that include various types of transport (trucks, cars, tanks)
- Daily Bonus that allow to earn more coins
- Time-based missions that become more and more difficult
